contents.text: Thank you for calling The Athletic in San Francisco, your source for premium local and national sports coverage—no ads, no clickbait, only stories with substance.
For subscription, billing, and account support, press 1.
To start a new subscription, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a subscription specialist.

navigationGoals: Set up a new annual subscription to The Athletic.
I want to start a new subscription so I can access premium local and national sports coverage.
Activate a new subscription to The Athletic, select my preferred plan, and configure recurring billing.
I’d like help starting a new subscription to The Athletic.
I’d like to sign up for a new Athletic subscription.

contents.text: For billing questions or to manage your account, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our account support team.

navigationGoals: Update my billing details and review my recent invoice.
I need help updating my billing information and managing my account payment methods.
Update my credit card details and retrieve my latest billing invoice for account reconciliation.
I need to update my billing information on my account.
I need to update my billing information on my existing account.

contents.text: For editorial inquiries and partnerships, press 2.
To pitch a story or contact our writers, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to our editorial team.

navigationGoals: Pitch a story idea to The Athletic’s editorial team.
I’d like to pitch a story idea about veteran athletes to your editorial team.
Pitch a data-driven story proposal to an editor and request an editorial contact for follow-up.
I want to pitch a local sports story idea to your editorial team.
I have a sports-analytics story idea I’d like to pitch.

contents.text: For advertising and partnership opportunities, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Discuss advertising partnership opportunities with The Athletic.
I’m interested in advertising my veteran-owned small business through a partnership with The Athletic.
Initiate a partnership discussion for a branded content campaign and request ad specs and rate card.
I’m interested in learning about advertising opportunities with The Athletic.
I want to explore advertising or sponsorship opportunities.
